titleStmt.title: The Rebel captive an excellent new song, on the taking of Argile in Scotland by three young men, who met him as he was flying away in disguise, after his men had deserted hin [sic], &c.

notesStmt.note: "To the tune of Sawny and Jockey."
Place and date of publication suggested by NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Imperfect: cropped, with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
